name: Hide and Seek with the Death
name_original: Hide and Seek with the Death
description:
Description

Hide and Seek with the Death is a GameJam project where you try to collect soul shards while escaping the Reapers. Try not to let grumpy Death catch you!

How to Play

Run around with a right click und activate abilities with the numbers 1-3. 

Find the soul shards and try not to get caught by the lurking Reapers.

Why we did this game

The game was developed as part of a student course on the topic of death and dying. Since death always has a certain creepy factor, the idea and mechanics of the hide-and-seek game were designed with death as the villain.

System Requirements

PC, Mouse and Keyboard.

Known Issues

Using the Lamp-overload-Ability is quite hard.

Titlescreen could glitch into purple...

Planned Features

Multiplayer?
